document_data.name: Love Bite
document_data.mainbody: '''''Love bite''''' was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[alteration]] [[spell]] used by priests devoted to [[Sune]], enabling them to deliver a phantom kiss to a target.
document_data.Effects: When this spell was cast the caster selected a target and kissed the air, allowing them to interact with a visible target in several ways. The caster could actually kiss the target, bite them, or affect them with another touch-based spell cast within three minutes before casting ''love bite''.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast.
